Our Services

What SWM Electrical Offers

We provide expert electrical services designed to keep your home or business running smoothly, efficiently, and safely.

Air-Con Maintenance & Upgrades

Keep your home cool and efficient with expert maintenance and upgrades for evaporative air conditioning units.

Fan Installations

Beat the heat with professional fan installations that enhance comfort and circulation throughout your home.

Lighting Installations & Repairs

Brighten up your space with reliable lighting installations and repairs tailored to your needs.

Power Points & USB Ports Installations

Upgrade your power access with modern power points and USB ports for ultimate convenience.

Meter Board Maintenance & Upgrades

Ensure your home or business has safe and reliable power distribution with expert meter board maintenance and upgrades.

Emergency Electrical Services

Available for urgent repairs and electrical emergencies to keep you safe and restore power quickly.

Family-Owned Electricians

Meet SWM Electrical

At SWM Electrical, we pride ourselves on delivering trusted, reliable, and family-oriented service to our local community. Established in 2019, we bring over a decade of expertise to every project, from small repairs to major installations.

Family Values and Personalized Service

We treat every client like family and bring over a decade of expertise to every project.

Local Commitment

Proudly serving Enfield and surrounding suburbs with integrity and dedication to our community.

Expertise with Heart

Combining technical expertise with a genuine passion for providing the best electrical solutions.

Join Our Family of Satisfied Clients

Contact us today and experience the difference of personalized, family-oriented service.

Family-Owned Electricians

We Deliver Quality Results

Supporting SWM Electrical means supporting a local family-owned business that values trust, quality, and community. We offer a 10% discount for seniors to thank them for their contributions to our community.

Personalized Service

We offer tailored electrical solutions, ensuring that each project is completed with attention to your unique needs and preferences.

Decades of Electrical Expertise

Our team brings over a decade of experience to provide reliable, expert electrical solutions for homes and businesses.

Seniors Discount: 10% Off All Services

We honor our senior citizens by offering a 10% discount on all services, recognizing their contributions to our community.

FAQs

Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to some of the most common questions we receive about our services at SWM Electrical.

Why choose SWM Electrical?

SWM Electrical is a trusted family-owned business with over a decade of experience in the industry. We pride ourselves on providing personalized service, expert electrical solutions, and a strong commitment to our local community in Enfield.

What areas do you service?

We proudly serve Enfield and the surrounding suburbs. If you're unsure whether we can service your area, please give us a call, and we'll be happy to assist.

Do you offer emergency electrical services?

Yes, we offer emergency electrical services to ensure that your urgent electrical issues are addressed promptly. Whether it's a power outage or faulty wiring, weâ€™re here to help.

What services do you provide?

We offer a wide range of services, including air conditioning maintenance, fan installations, lighting repairs, power point and USB port installations, meter board upgrades, and more.

Do you offer any discounts?

Yes, we offer a 10% discount for senior citizens as a thank you for their contributions to the community. Contact us to find out more about our discounts and promotions.

How can I schedule an appointment?

Scheduling an appointment is easy! You can call us at 0450 759 632 or email us at info.swmelectrical@gmail.com. Weâ€™ll work with you to find a time that fits your schedule.
